DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose randomize control trial evaluate long term effect effectiveness Ankle foot orthoses ( AFO ) reduce risk fall old adult . Primary Endpoints • Characterize impact AFO balance , gait , risk fall , frailty status , adverse event Secondary Endpoints • Characterize Impact AFO spontaneous daily physical activity • Characterize feasibility AFO device patient adherence , acceptability , user-friendliness , perception benefit daily usage
DOC.brief_title: OHI -- Randomized Control Trial Evaluate Efficacy , Acceptability , Perception Benefit Innovative Custom AFO
DOC.criteria: Age 65 old High risk fall Ambulatory Patients active wound infection Patients immune suppressor Acute fracture foot Acute heart failure Major foot amputation
